resources.string: Lord of food is a name of flavour and ambiance. We have the best chefs and recipes of town on our page. We strive hard to deliver satisfactory quality food with good price. We aim to have a chain of restaurants in near future to establish a solid name in food industry. We are motivated to earn a strong reputation as a pioneer among restaurants.

LOF offers a perfect gathering place for friends and families where you will enjoy wonderful appetizers, house specialties, Continental, Italian, Chinese, Traditional Charcoal BBQ, Desserts and Fast Food dishes.
TFine cuisine, modern ambiance and impeccable service, coupled with our motto: “Taste above the Class”, will keep you coming back time and time again. So come visit Lord of Food and their enthusiastic, well-trained team and take part in the memorable experiences they have to offer.
17, Block-C, OPF Housing Society Khayaban-E-Jinnah, Lahore.

Goraya is the business tycoon and the harbinger of new trend setting concepts in business industry . Goraya\'s investment philosophy contributed to the world in a bargain-buying strategy for the generation of investors. He said, “If you’re making a good investment you will secure your future.” He is a great role model for investors of the next generation. He believes that The essence of good taste is a sense of values, and a sense of values is the pivotal point of good living.
